CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Enlivex Therapeutics Ltd is an Israel-based development-stage biopharmaceutical company. It is focused on developing and commercializing an allogeneic drug pipeline for rebalancing immune hyper-responses. The company's Allocetra is an immunotherapy that is being developed to rebalance a life-threatening unbalanced immune system, using the immune system's own natural regulation mechanisms.
